name: Paris, France
description: The city of lights and love, famous for its art, fashion, and landmarks.

details.long_description: Paris, the capital of France, is known for its iconic Eiffel Tower, world-class museums like the Louvre, and charming cafés.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Paris, visit the Eiffel Tower, and explore the Seine River.
Day 2: Discover the Louvre Museum and stroll through the Champs-Élysées.
Day 3: Visit Montmartre, Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy a Seine river cruise.

name: Kyoto, Japan
description: A city of temples and tradition, where the past meets the present.

details.long_description: Kyoto, Japan's cultural heart, is home to ancient temples, stunning gardens, and traditional tea houses.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Fushimi Inari Shrine and explore Gion district.
Day 2: Tour Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) and Arashiyama Bamboo Forest.
Day 3: Experience a traditional tea ceremony and visit Nijo Castle.

name: New York City, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, full of skyscrapers, Broadway, and Central Park.

details.long_description: New York City is a melting pot of cultures and entertainment, featuring Times Square, the Statue of Liberty, and world-class museums.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Times Square, Broadway, and the Empire State Building.
Day 2: Explore Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, and 5th Avenue shopping.
Day 3: Take a ferry to the Statue of Liberty and enjoy a skyline view from Brooklyn Bridge.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Famous for its white-washed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets.

details.long_description: Santorini is a Greek island known for its picturesque villages, volcanic beaches, and breathtaking caldera views.
itinerary: Day 1: Explore Fira and Oia, watch the sunset at Oia Castle.
Day 2: Visit the ancient ruins of Akrotiri and relax on the Red Beach.
Day 3: Enjoy a sailing tour of the volcanic islands and hot springs.

name: Cairo, Egypt
description: Home to the Pyramids of Giza, ancient temples, and vibrant bazaars.

details.long_description: Cairo, the capital of Egypt, offers a mix of ancient wonders like the Great Pyramids and vibrant city life.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.
Day 2: Explore the Egyptian Museum and the Khan el-Khalili bazaar.
Day 3: Cruise the Nile River and visit the Mosque of Muhammad Ali.

name: Dubai, UAE
description: A modern city of skyscrapers, luxury shopping, and desert adventures.

details.long_description: Dubai is known for its ultramodern architecture, including the Burj Khalifa, luxury shopping, and exciting desert safaris.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall.
Day 2: Explore the Palm Jumeirah and relax at JBR Beach.
Day 3: Experience a desert safari with dune bashing and camel rides.

name: Mumbai, India
description: The financial capital of India, a mix of colonial history, Bollywood, and vibrant street life.

details.long_description: Mumbai is India's entertainment and financial hub, known for the Gateway of India, Marine Drive, and Bollywood film industry.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit the Gateway of India and Elephanta Caves.
Day 2: Explore Marine Drive, Chowpatty Beach, and enjoy street food.
Day 3: Tour Bollywood studios and shop at Colaba Causeway.

name: Cape Town, South Africa
description: A city of breathtaking landscapes, Table Mountain, and rich history.

details.long_description: Cape Town is known for its stunning beaches, the iconic Table Mountain, and its connection to Nelson Mandela's legacy.
itinerary: Day 1: Hike or take a cable car up Table Mountain.
Day 2: Visit Robben Island and learn about Nelson Mandela.
Day 3: Explore Cape Point and Boulders Beach to see penguins.

name: Rome, Italy
description: A city of ancient wonders, home to the Colosseum and Vatican City.

details.long_description: Rome, the heart of Italy, offers breathtaking landmarks such as the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain, and the Vatican.
itinerary: Day 1: Explore the Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Day 2: Visit Vatican City and the Sistine Chapel.
Day 3: Enjoy authentic Italian cuisine in Trastevere.

name: Sydney, Australia
description: Famous for the Sydney Opera House and Bondi Beach.

details.long_description: Sydney is Australia's largest city, known for its stunning harbor, iconic Opera House, and golden beaches.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit the Sydney Opera House and Harbor Bridge.
Day 2: Explore Bondi Beach and take the coastal walk to Coogee.
Day 3: Visit Taronga Zoo and enjoy a sunset cruise.

name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: A city of beautiful beaches, samba music, and Christ the Redeemer.

details.long_description: Rio de Janeiro is famous for its vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Christ the Redeemer and Sugarloaf Mountain.
Day 2: Enjoy Copacabana and Ipanema Beach.
Day 3: Experience the nightlife in Lapa and attend a samba show.
